name: Langdedrosa Cyanwrath

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
text: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Improved Critical
text: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.

action.name: Greatsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: Langdedrosa breathes lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 91
